content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_sales_territory') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory(    
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryRegion] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryCountry] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryGroup] [nvarchar](50))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimSalesTerritory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_sales_territory'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_sales_territory;
